website_summaries.verdict: Soft, moist, non-scented wipes from a well-known brand.
pros: Customers appreciate that these are gentle yet sturdy and have a good amount of moisture
Most report that the gentle ingredients and lack of fragrance are excellent for sensitive skin
cons: A few felt the wipes tore too easily or didn't like the packaging
may not be right for all skin

customer_reviews.title: No resealing tab!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d listened to the other reviewer who said it contains tall 12” packages (3 of them). And the packages don’t have a reseal option. You just cut into the package to open it and there they are. I ended up buying a Huggies container at Target (that closes) and am just refilling the container with half of a pkg at a time (all that can fit) so they don’t dry out. Then I tape closed the other 1/2 of the pkg. until it’s ready for refilling. Otherwise the product itself is fine.
customer_reviews.author: T. West

customer_reviews.title: Can live without! My number one baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: I change my baby all kinds of places. Turns out she doesn't care where we are, when she has to go, she does! For these occasions I love most of the other types of wipes that come in individual packages. But they are kind of pain to get out one handed, they tend to come out in multiples and/or rip in half. With a wiggly, less than amused, poop cover toddler...not my favorite! So I purchasedand the combination with these wipes is irreplaceable! I now use these two products as my go to baby shower gift. I keep one dispenser in the nursery and the other in the living room. So good for one handed wipe retrieval!
customer_reviews.author: Sara E Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I loves these wipes! I refill my plastic bins and keep them in all of my bathrooms. They are unscented and very moist. I use them for my dogs to clean their paws, eyes, faces and rear ends. I also use them for my hairless cats once per week instead of water bathing bc they hate water. These clean them right up and remove the oils their skin produces which left unchecked stains my furniture and bedding. I also use them to remove my makeup before washing with soap _ water. And use them as wipes when toilet paper just isn't cutting it. These are a staple in my house
customer_reviews.author: holly

customer_reviews.title: Tear apart too easily
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are awful! I bought 2 boxes because they got such great reviews. I took out a bundle and put them in our wipes dispenser. The first wipe I tried to use tore into two pieces. The next diaper my husband changed tore while he was cleaning a bm and he got poo all over his hand. He asked me where the pampers were and told me to send these garbage wipes to daycare (comical moment in our house for me). It’s worth spending the extra dollar it may cost for pampers.
customer_reviews.author: mgravina

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: Upset about how this arrived... one of the three packages was ripped open and the box was wet from the wipes leaking while the wipes were dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Super thick and supple cloth
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many other different brands that are supposed to be "natural", only to still deal with diaper rash. The Huggies Natural Care wipes are super soft and thick. They stay moist and are easy to dispense from the container/package since they are accordion folded. I haven't dealt with as much diaper rash since using this brand, and love how supple they feel. They wipe smoothly, easily removing the yucky stuff. The price is great, especially after spending more than double on wipes previously.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: I do love these-the only thing is the last time I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the one of two baby wipes brands that I use on my babies. I do love these-the only thing is the last time I purchased these from Amazon, I noticed a faint foul odor then the odor got stronger so that was a definite sign to stop using them and discarded them. Amazon customer service was helpful in sending a replacement. Still, the replacement had the same problem. I didn't bother requesting another replacement. Although a little inconvenient and pricier, I will just purchase from the store. I was looking forward to the convenience of having it on subscription. I hope Huggies/Amazon finds out what could be the culprit of that found odor since the wipes are unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Mama

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick and moist.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are very moist, thick and just the right size. I don't have a baby, but I use them for medical needs because I have a urostomy and a ostomy. Clean up is very important, and these, in comparison to the cheaper brands work way better, and I use less because they are so moist and thick. No scent, and no extras in there that I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: LA Grace

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "648 Wipes Count Total" version, but still only received the refills. If, like me, you think you will be receiving the flip top on there, then you are mistaken. The picture on this is very misleading as it shows the flip-top and not the refill packs. Plus, there are two options to buy and only one says "refill" which is why I ordered the other one but still received the refills. So, in essence, it looks like both options are the same. I returned mine unopened, so please check that before you buy and make sure that the description says "Flip-top."
customer_reviews.author: JScholar

customer_reviews.title: Worst wipes ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are a joke. They are dry feeling, thin and tear easily, and you cant get more than one out of the damn container. At 2 am when your changing poo an you dont have to open the container completely and pull the wipes completely out just to use one that rips, youll thank me.
customer_reviews.author: chelse

customer_reviews.title: They are the best. They are thick
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Huggies Natural Care when it comes to baby wipes. I used them with both my daughter and my son. They are the best. They are thick, absorbent, don't leave a soap like film, they are large enough to cover my whole hand, and best of all they don't dry out super easy. I keep a small pack in purse to clean spills or wipe faces when running errands with my children. I love the big packs as you can refill the tubs and travel size containers that most people give for baby showers and birthdays. I either purchase or recommend Huggies when invited to a baby shower or asked.
customer_reviews.author: taibar85

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Costs double for the 624 pack! READ!
customer_reviews.text: Hey everyone! I don't get why it costs half for the 624 pack? It's also 3 bags full of wipes! Same brand Huggies. Same model Natural Care. The 624 pack has the resealable top! Just search Amazon for the 624 sheets for half price! Quick before they find out! Like if you found this helpful. Thank you have a nice day. :) (Posted 5/10/2020)
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Gave my baby a rash
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better before purchasing. Wipes don’t come in individual wipe packages. Comes in giant bags and dries out quickly. I have a wipe warmer so that wasn’t a big deal. The problem with these wipes was they gave my baby a rash immediately and caused a lot of irritation and major diaper rash. Stopped using them and it cleaned right up.
customer_reviews.author: ScarRo0430

customer_reviews.title: Just what I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wipes. They hold up well to poopy cleanups and are safer for my baby's skin. (I tend to have babies with sensitive skin and need to be mindful of the products that are coming in contact with their bodies.) There's no strong smell or alcohol. I noticed recently that many stores have started carrying the small travel packs in these big boxes. I like having the refills for my home we containers and my travel clutches. I was so glad that Amazon still carried the product I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsy HC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but gentle wipe
customer_reviews.text: We have tried all sorts of baby wipes over the past 3 years with both of our children, and we have consistently found that Huggies Natural Care baby wipes are the best. The texture is gentle enough not to bother either of our children, and it is rugged enough to endure all kinds of cleanup situations. We find that it cleans up baby poop the best. I find that for the price, these wipes offer the best value.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: These are good wipes, but I find that they dry out ...
customer_reviews.text: These are good wipes, but I find that they dry out quickly if you don't seal the bag. In my opinion, Huggies wipes are better for use with newborns and babies up to 6 months because they have very runny stools, particularly if they're completely breastfed. Huggies wipes worked perfectly, with the right amount of moistness to clean the mess. I found that using Pampers with my newborn was more messy than using Huggies because Pamper wipes were often too moist, and using very moist wipes to wipe runny stools off a baby's bum would get very messy and left the bum wet and prone to diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: SYLVIA S KONG

customer_reviews.title: Sharp piece embedded in wipe!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 2.5 months old and we have used huggies since the day he was born but we are never using or recommending huggies anymore because upon using a wipe today we found a sharp piece of glass or plastic embedded into the wipe!
customer_reviews.author: Warnali

customer_reviews.title: A must for parents! Useful for other things too!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been using these for 3 years and 2 kids without complaint. I don't know how people survived without them! These wipes are a must for any parent of younger kids, or just people that like to stay clean. I'm an engineer and I find all kinds of cleaning uses for them. They're tough, just moist enough to take most caked on substances off, without soaking something, and there is no scent with very little residue/cleaning agents. The one thing they are terrible at, is cleaning glass... but that's not surprising. For cleaning babies, they are great because they sooth skin and are soft, but they still get the really sticky stuff off!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: I really like these wipes a lot especially since all my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these wipes a lot especially since all my kids have sensitive skin its nice to not have to woe about hidden chemicals and such, I like that i don't have to think twice when I use this product. My only problem is the wipe it self falls apart fast. For example if you are in a rush and you crab one fast it may fall apart of rip which can be annoying. Its still with buying especially with kids who have sensitive skin ! it works well over all.
customer_reviews.author: AWeis

customer_reviews.title: Wipes were not cut properly
customer_reviews.text: Wipes are great. However, the wipes were not cut properly. It's nothing about upside down as what was mentioned in a previous comment. I used these wipes to refill my Huggies tub and found, instead of folding into the next one, the wipes were actually one long continuous sheet with light cuts just like toilet rolls. These cuts are so light that won't break the wipes from the next piece when you pull them out of the tub. It is so frustrating because you had to leave your little one hands off on changing table and use two hands to tear wipes... terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has sensitive skin and for the longest time I was using the water wipes, which work great also, but were more expensive. These do not agitate my daughters skin, are cost effective enough that I don't feel guilty using them for wiping off a counter from a spill here or there and can use them on my newborn. Saving the water wipes for if/when they have a diaper rash.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste Money on Water Wipes
customer_reviews.text: If you look through my reviews, you will see that I think water wipes are the biggest marketing scam. These are 99% water according to my understanding, the the best part is that the towelette is actually thick enough to not worry about getting nasties on your hand! Also, they are easy to pull out of a dispenser (unlike water wipes). I love these! I use them on my baby and also for myself to stay clean. I also recommend these over Target’s Up and Up brand, as those do not have much moisture and the towelettes kind of fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: ATM

customer_reviews.title: Most natural and suitable for my baby's skin!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom I ensured to research wipes as I wanted the best for my baby's skin. This line of Huggies wipes proved to be the most natural and suitable for newborns. I have been using it since day 1 and he is now 4+ months. It has the right balance of wetness that makes cleaning up a breeze. The material is strong yet gentle enough. My baby has not chafed since birth. Combined with Huggies Snug and Dry Diapers, I have had no problems. Will definitely continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Davia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but it needs a diaper holder
customer_reviews.text: Huggies diapers are great to use and absorb well but this pack comes in a 3 packs of 200 wipes each. You will need a diaper holder to store them and thats something that we didnt have in mind. If you use it from the given packs, then the bag does not close properly and wipes will dry out.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: are nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: These wipes have no odor, are nice and thick, a good size, and very effective. I recommend them very highly, I don't think you could get anything better. They come in large packages, along with a very well made ziploc pouch (that you can continue to reload) with a little opening in the front (like the single packs that you can buy in the store But much more substantial), and attractive with a woven handle, in a very cheery and colorful material - perfect for storing wipes in your handbag, diaper bag or just in your kitchen. Could not be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Holly S. Zassenhaus

customer_reviews.title: Huggies baby wipes unscented
customer_reviews.text: All natural Huggies baby wipes. This large 3 pack is very convenient and handy. Since the wipes are so gentle we use them to boy pants and other body parts when regular washing is not convenient. We have never had any problems with any skin irritations highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Only Wipes We Use In Our Family!
customer_reviews.text: We love these wipes, we have two children, 2 yr old and 5 month old. These wipes are perfect for us, thick in size, just enough moisture, we've never had an issue with them drying out, even when we have stocked up for several months. Highly recommend! Fast reoccurring shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: Best Buttwipes
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wipes. My sons skin is super sensitive and we have never had an issue with them. (In 4 yrs of use). My daughter uses them to get makeup off her face. They are the perfect size and thickness. I haven't found another brand that can compare.
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy anything else!
customer_reviews.text: I've had two babies, each with incredibly sensitive skin and these wipes are super durable, super functional, and I have used them on every inch of my kids without ever having a single problem. I swear up and down by pampers cruisers for diapers and these for wipes. And there was a couple different bits of "news" going around about huggies wipes, but when I investigated, the natural care for sensitive skin wipes never had the fiberglass particles, and the preservative causing skin irritation is not present in these
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Easier than buying in the store
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wipes. They’re unscented and are gentle on your baby’s skin. I much prefer buying this online, it’s difficult to purchase large heavy items like this in the store when you have to bring your baby with you unless another adult comes along.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Best value for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Natural Care Wipes by Huggies are perfect for baby's with sensitive skin on their bottoms! My middle son had awful rashes and this was the best I could find to help alleviate his outbreaks. I have always preferred the Huggies brand and this version has worked best for my daycare kids and my own kids that have eczema and bad rashes.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Disario

customer_reviews.title: They are nice and strong and don't rip with those tougher diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: Huggies wipes are our go to brand. They are nice and strong and don't rip with those tougher diaper changes. We like getting them in the bulk packages and the soft carriers that you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Doll

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRAVEL REFILLS
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize these were wrapped in a huge package, they aren’t the travel size ones. I had to tape the package closed because there are too many to fit inside the refillable case. There are about 3 uses per sealed package and 2 sealed packs inside the big box. Luckily the wipes didn’t dry out with being taped. The wipes are thick and work great, but I prefer the travel wipe refills to this type.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The come out of the box perfectly one at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Huggies has the best wipes. All other wipes I’ve used come out in a wad stuck to the other wipes. Makes me so mad bc it just wastes them, but not these! One perfect wipe comes out every time! If you’re trying to wrestle a wriggling baby with one hand, then you don’t have the ability to wrestle with the wipes too! I LOVE these so much I vow to use nothing BUT these from now on.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: BEST WIPES EVER
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are so nice. I used these with my daughter when she was a baby, and now I am using them again with my infant son. These wipes are thick, wet, and just totally perfect. They are high quality and get the job done, plus they are natural so you can feel good about wiping your little ones buns! They came quickly after I ordered them, so that is a plus too. Huggies natural care wipes are my go to every time.
customer_reviews.author: Mae44

customer_reviews.title: ... used these with both of our girls and I recommend them to anyone who ask what we use
customer_reviews.text: We ave used these with both of our girls and I recommend them to anyone who ask what we use. They have a cloth like feel to them so when you are having to clean a dirty bottom it helps to clean it and not smear it around like I have found the Pampers does. Nether one of our kids has had issues with them causing no breakouts or irritation at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberry Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and aloe soothing bonus!
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent of these wipes and the aloe content is soothing to baby's diaper area. My baby has had allergic rashes in response to other wipes but has not had rashes with the combination of these wipes, max strength desitin, and pampers swaddlers. I recommend these wipes to others! I give 4 stars and not 5 because I would prefer smaller refill packages when buying in bulk (so one can go in the diaper bag) and the wipes tend to tear about one out 5 wipes I use (likely due to the high water content, so I do understand).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for wiping poo
customer_reviews.text: They clean my baby's bottom well and keeps "stuff" off my hands while cleaning. However, they do not keep me from uncontrollably gagging and feeling nauseous when I have to change a "number two." My wife bought a discount brand of wipes once... That junk was MESH! All kinds of nasty would get on your fingers. Since then I always pay the little bit extra for the good brand. With these, I don't have to quadruple up on wipes to keep poo off my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love the grip the rigges give you! Hate the rewards
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes as I buy them on the regular from amazon! 😊😎 They are the best wipes to me because I like the quilted part to clean and the unscented part because my child has sensitive skin. My only complaint is how you can not receive rewards for buying this because the reward system for Huggies requires you to scan a receipt. Hello!? Pampers rewards let you scan the product which is 1000 times better. That's why I kicked a star off because i like the product and would love to use the rewards 😭
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Large packages
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased. It does contain 3 large ziplock bags of wipes so you do need to put them in a gallon sized Ziploc bag if you want to bring them along in your diaper bag. They are not too rough and so far they have not irritated my 3 week olds tucus.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Love the wipes
customer_reviews.text: I subscribe to this product! Love the wipes. I try everything on myself before using on my baby. And these dont sting or leave a strange residue. They feel like moist toilettes with water! I feel suoer clean amd non irritated after use. And this time around i got a bonus clutch! Those things arent too cheap and they are very durable! Score! Ill continue to buy this product. Lobe love love
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as their diapers
customer_reviews.text: I love huggies little movers and I decided that if they could make the best diapers in the busines then making good wipes was just natural, well not really f you enjoy fingers going thru your wipes and feeling the pudding like texture of your babies already processed and food on you when you are trying to clean them then buy this, otherwise stuck to something like pampers. Or just deal with poop on your fingers but I'll tell you what, if you have a wedding ring with creavaces it will be fun trying to get all the poop out when this things break.
customer_reviews.author: hermes rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: My go-to brand
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of wipes, I refuse to use anything else. when my first was a baby she had an allergic reaction (or I would) to almost every other brand of wipes. So with my second, I went straight back to these wipes. Still have never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice moist wipes with many uses
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in every room of the house and also in the car. Mom finds them great for the baby but, you'll soon find they are great for many, many other things. For a quick, easy and refreshing clean up, Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes are the answer. Made with the right amount of moisture and strength, they get the job done with with less wipes than other brands. Looking for a quick way to remove your makeup, wipe the kid's hands and mouth after a snack or meal, give these a try. You won't be sorry. The large package will last me 3 or 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy any others as these are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I only use this brand now. I'm tired of the flimsy, fibrous and almost stretchy feeling wipes. I don't feel like anything is seeping through to my fingers when I use Huggies wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: The perfect wipe!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes really are fantastic. They are great quality, I usually only need one wipe to do the job. They are soft and delicate, and don't leave a residue on my baby's bottom. I am confident that my baby is clean without the need for chemicals and fragrances.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bannon

customer_reviews.title: The packaging kind of sucks. 3 big packs isn’t really practical
customer_reviews.text: The packaging kind of sucks. 3 big packs isn’t really practical. I’d give 5 stars if the zippers were slides instead of clicks. The wipes are great. No scents, they’re super soft, and they work great for wiping sticky toddler hands and faces when a paper towel just won’t do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: MamaFlem

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: My whole family uses the wipes now, even the dog. We use it for hands, feet and of course in the bathroom. The moistness and thickness it just right. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Depends what you  want in a wipe
customer_reviews.text: Huggies natural care wipes do the job right. But it depends what you like in a wipe. These are thick, strong and obsorbent too....but they are a little too thick for my personal liking. I like a more stretchy wipe. These can be hard to take out of a dispenser and take slightly more space than other. My husband prefers these while I prefer others but they both get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Pampers wipes
customer_reviews.text: Way better than Pampers wipes, which are too thin in my opinion. I've also tried many store brands but Huggies beat out every single type of wipes I've tried. Plus, the price is fantastic!! We have not had any issues with diaper rash or sensitivity to these wipes. They come in a couple large bags of wipes which are resealable and easy to load into a wipe warmer or small reusable baby wipe pouch for a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a great price, except...
customer_reviews.text: This month (I've been on subscribe and save for 5 months) my unscented wipes have an odd smell, as if the wipes had become expired or something. My husband also noticed the smell for the first time this month, otherwise I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmayne

customer_reviews.title: Great wipe for all around and more
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best wipe. I've tried them all. Perfect amount of liquid. No residue left. I only use them to wipe around my house. Tile floor for a scuff, wipe a high gloss painted door and many more things. I wish the cost was not so high for prepackaged and if I buy in bulk there is no plastic container included.
customer_reviews.author: Shari G.

customer_reviews.title: Ends up being cheaper in the long run
customer_reviews.text: absolutely the best baby wipes ever. A little bit more expensive than I would like, but they still end up being cheaper than the budget ones because you use so many more of the cheap ones that you do of these. And I would really know, I have twins.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Natural Fibers
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes because they are have a natural fiber feel to the touch. They never fall apart during use and always get the job done thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshineanddirt

customer_reviews.title: Wipes come in three big backs rather than smaller packs.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes leave strings/ residue behind. They come in three big bags, rather than individual packs. I did not realize that when I ordered them. They are cheaper, but I am not sure it is worth it. You need the plastic tub with these and they are pain to get out of the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: So bad it was all lumped in a large package
customer_reviews.text: So bad it was all lumped in a large package. You have to have 5 extra empty wipe boxes if you open the package. Half of mine dried out cause I could only fit some into my 2 empty boxes. I wouldn't buy this item. Go for something that has individual plastic package so when you open one the rest don't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Fahria Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to buy the Huggies box to refill
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes over the pampers and water wipes. They’re thick enough that one gets the job done (if only pee). Just make sure you do get the same brand box that you’ll use to refill as they’re not precut so the Pampers box doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Eni

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipes Out There!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I prefer to use for any and everything. They are the perfect thickness, they have no smell, and they have the perfect amount of moisture. These are my go to wipes hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Bizzie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Best wipes on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of wipe that doesn’t irritate my daughter. This giant pack lasted us several months which was convenient instead of buying a million tiny packs.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great product, thick durable wipes
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy a different brand of wipes. Every other wipe I have tried are thin and rip, and who wants a finger to poke through a wipe right into poo? These are thick and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C Thompson

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST baby wipes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best baby wipes! We have been using them for over 11 years because they are simple, don't cause irritation, they are soft and they work! I've tried many different wipes in the past, some more expensive, some less expensive but none of them have come close to the Huggies Natural Care wipes! I not only use them for diaper changes but they are great for cleaning up spills around the house and in the car and wiping dirty hands and faces.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome family

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but soft.
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than Pampers because they are more sturdy. This is the best value pack and I received them the very next day. Wayyyyy cheaper than going to Walmart for them! But that is beside the point, the product itself is amazing. I use way less wipes because they wipe up so much more than other types and brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wipes for baby butts
customer_reviews.text: These are the only wipes I will use on my babies for diaper changes! They are thick and durable. I've tried Pampers and Babyganics wipes also, which are way too thin. They're okay for faces and hands, even a pee diaper, but I only use Huggies Naturals for messy butts.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Passet

customer_reviews.title: Refill
customer_reviews.text: Pleas pay attention that this product is for refill. It’s not separate wipes packs. The wipes are okay but they are a little too harsh on the baby skin
customer_reviews.author: Nastassia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WIPES!
customer_reviews.text: Have had absolutely no problems or rashes with these. Been using since my son was a newborn. Not too thin and not too thick. Very soft also. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tania M. Loaisiga

customer_reviews.title: The best wipes ever
customer_reviews.text: I just loves these. They have way less chemicals, are super thick and large wipes. And the price with subscribe and save is like $12 which is like less than $.02 per wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette E. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Thick/durable and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I used to love the scented kind but these are better to assure baby doesn’t have allergic reaction. They are thick, so it only takes two wipes for most poop cleanups! You can also use them to wipe the baby’s body and face as a quick in-between bath cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: MoniceSharde

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipes!...Terrible Reward System
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite wipes! They are the strongest and best cleaning wipes that we've tried...we've tried a lot of different wipes. I just wish their reward system was like pampers. I won't use huggies rewards...they make it too difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Buggies is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have always used buggies on my kids and now its all I use for my dying mama
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Chrissy Craig

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wipes because they are gentle, they don't have a strong odor, and they aren't frothy like some other wipes. They get the job done and they are the best I have seen for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Amazon subscription
customer_reviews.text: These are by far and away my favorite wipes. I have used them through 3 kids, the newest is 7 months old. In a pinch I have used other people's wipes when I was out and about, or picked up a pack at the drug store in an emergency. And I'm always disappointed. I actually signed up for a subscription to get these delivered every month or every other month.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. The only ones I use because they are thick, no smell, and work really well. They don’t break out my children when I use them to wipe down their faces and hands...and they work really well to wipe up messes as well. I have four little ones and they really come in handy. The beat hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Victoria X

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the go to for babies with sensitive skin and also preventative against diaper rash. Been using this since LO was born and his bum is super soft, n rash free. The aloe and bit E does work truly. Each wipe is thick and wet enough for easy clean, dispenses individually an doesn't dry out easily. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Haleemah

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: There is something wrong with these wipes. From the manufacturer every 4 or 5 wipes, two (2) wipes remain attached to each other. The machine that cuts these wipes misses a couple of wipes, therefore you get two (2) that aren't seperated. Bad quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Rob369

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great wipes for the price. However, they tend to rip easily when we remove them from our wipes container or while wiping baby. We like that this box has a ton of wipes and is a great way to refill our wipes container many times at a good price. Wish the wipe quality was a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Comes on time. They work great. packages have a zip lock to hold in the wetness. They are fairly heavy duty. Would buy them again and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried just about every wipe on the market. These are the best. Unlike other brands, these are packaged differently, and only one comes out at a time. They're thick and clean well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little one
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes. Delicate enough for my baby's bottom and even my face and hands. I do prefer the wipes that come boxed in the individual bags but at least these are resealable. Price is decent.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMeezy

customer_reviews.title: Thick and quilted (in a good way!)
customer_reviews.text: We love these wipes! The quilted texture makes them thicker and better than other brands for cleaning up messes and diapers. I like the huge refill sizes to keep in the nursery. These are the same price as the Amazon brand wipes, which I liked, but these are better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pemi

customer_reviews.title: Keep coming back to these
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these wipes almost exclusively from the birth of my son in Jan of 2015. We love them. They are thick and moist, and clean up messes well. We have tried other brands (shower gifts and very good deals) and keep coming back to these. I have a tub in the nursery, a clutch in the diaper bag and one of the stand-up small tubs in the kitchen/living room; the refill concept is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: RLW513

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE WIPES
customer_reviews.text: Great value/price for these wipes! We cloth diaper but use disposable wipes. My daughter is allergic to every other wipe. These wipes are soft yet strong (like cottonelle toilet paper!). They're the only ones I'll use. I searched and made sure I was getting a good deal for these wipes and trust me this is a great d al for wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Mae Jardot

customer_reviews.title: High quality on the little ones skin.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are worth the money. We only buy huggies knowing they have the best quality. These wipes stay soft and don't tear. No perfume on them which is nice. Just the right size and always stay moist inside the plastic refillable container. We have them in all areas of our home, as well as the vehicles. They work well for cleaning up little messes, and sticky hands.
customer_reviews.author: andramike

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: First of all let me start off by saying that I think Huggies wipes are the best in general. These value packs are no different and offer both quality and they are offered at a reasonable price. What more could a mother ask for? Well maybe wipes that don't rip in the middle of a hectic diaper change... needless to say a diaper that rips in the middle of a poopy diaper is less than ideal. So if they could be slightly more durable that would be the only improvement I could ever ask for!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Never have to use too many wipes, affordable and does not irritate my daughter skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann wolfe

customer_reviews.title: No dispenser
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are fine and affordable, but I was frustrated to find that they don't come in individual packs or include a dispenser since the product listing clearly shows pictures of the dispenser packs. It's just three very large bags of loose wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Ba

customer_reviews.title: Best value and quality wipes!! Great on prime
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest and best wipes!! Awesome value and I use 2 plastic Higgies refill boxes and the clutch in diaper bag. Gentle on baby skin too
customer_reviews.author: Anne Norman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These really clean the feces off your kids` brown eye.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wipes for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wipes for everyone. Have been using these since mine was born and still do. It does not come in a dispenser, just large sleeves of wipes. Formula cleanses well and is non-irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mama Bear 🌺❤️

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and really fresh
customer_reviews.text: This has to be my favorite brand Huggies. leaves you very light and refreshed afterwards without any of the extras sensor chemicals just a pure clean feeling
customer_reviews.author: Julie B

customer_reviews.title: We had always used Pampers sensitive wipes but our son's ...
customer_reviews.text: We had always used Pampers sensitive wipes but our son's bottom started getting very red often and switched to these wipes and have not had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle as water
customer_reviews.text: Used these since birth on my baby. Also make great makeup wipes. Every other brand and even others from the Huggies line cause rashes on my babies skin. These wipes have kept daiper rash away
customer_reviews.author: RiverQueen

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know these came in just two bags I thought they were separated. The bags are resealable but I wanted the separate bags so....blah!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Made a horrible diaper rash
customer_reviews.text: I like that the wipes are very thick and seem to grip. However after switching from pampers sensitive two weeks ago to these when I ran out, I noticed my baby girl got her first diaper rash and it's a terrible, huge, painful rash all over her bottom. The only change is the wipes. So 6 months of no diaper rash with Pampers sensitive wipes. 2 weeks of Huggies and she has a horrific rash. Now I have a whole box I can't use and STILL have to buy more wipes. At least the daycare can use this donation of wipes.:(
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: HUggies Natural care wipes
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to use the Huggies Natural care baby wipes brand of baby wipes over any other brand. They are thin enough they don't rip or tare to clean baby's bottom and gentle on the skin. I buy these every time my little one needs more wipes. This is a must have for all babies.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet will rip apart if needed too!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy wipes that break apart easily if you need to rip them in half. I hate using a whole one if I don't have too to save money. No scent and never and irritations have been using these exact wipes for 4 years!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Read the description to avoid being desapointed
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 packages with loads of wipes - however there are way to heavy to transport them. I like the brand - but I will suggest either buying another brand or same brand with a different package
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Levy

customer_reviews.title: Would order again
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Exactly like what you would buy in the store. These are the large bags with zip loc closure though, not the little packs.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Allison

customer_reviews.title: Contains soy
customer_reviews.text: Contains soy. I wish I knew this before ordering such a large quantity. My son has a soy allergy and this made him have a horrible raw contact allergy rash.
customer_reviews.author: Jenell Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Might as well use paper towels!
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave less than one star I would! These wipes are horrible. They’re hardly wet at all, so when you have a messy poop, they don’t clean it up. I used almost half a bag just trying to clean up the poopy diaper. In addition, they aren’t very durable and they tear really easily. I’m so upset that I ordered two boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Best wipes ever. Only wipes comparable are Aldi's but these are better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Franczak

product_meta.title: Huggies Natural Care Baby Wipes, Sensitive, Unscented, 3 Refill Packs, 648 Count Total
product_meta.description:
Size:648 Count

Care for your baby's delicate skin from the very start with HUGGIES Natural Care Baby Wipes. Safe for sensitive skin, Natural Care Wipes contain 99% triple-filtered water for a pure, gentle clean. Plus, they are pH-balanced to help maintain your newborn's natural skin barrier and enriched with aloe and vitamin E to help keep skin healthy and conditioned. The #1 branded wipe*, HUGGIES Wipes are dermatologically tested and hypo-allergenic. In addition, Natural Care sensitive wipes are fragrance-free, alcohol-free and paraben-free, and they contain no phenoxyethanol or MIT. You can feel confident you're giving your baby a safe, gentle clean with every wipe. HUGGIES Natural Care moist wipes come in a wide variety of package sizes and styles, perfect for use at home and on the go: travel pack, flip-top pack, refill pack, reusable pop-up tub and the stylish Clutch 'N' Clean refillable travel pack. Don’t get caught without wipes. Sign up for Subscribe & Save and make sure you always have HUGGIES Natural Care Wipes on hand.

*Based on market share in North America



BRAND STORY
By Huggies
feature_bullets: Pure & Gentle – HUGGIES Natural Care baby wipes contain 99% water that is triple-filtered for a gentle clean. Our diaper wipes are as gentle as cotton and water
Safe for Sensitive Skin – our gentle baby wipes are hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested, and enriched with aloe and vitamin E to keep baby's skin healthy

pH Balanced – to maintain your baby’s natural skin barrier, these wet wipes are free of harsh chemicals. Our Natural Care baby wipes are as soft and gentle on your little one as a mother's warm hug. Fragrance-free, alcohol-free, and paraben-free and do not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT
Our unscented, sensitive baby wipes are extra soft and gentle, ideal for sensitive, newborn skin. We use our simplest formula ever for these wipes, so you know you are giving baby a gentle clean
Refill bags and bulk cases are perfect for replenishing your Nursery Tub and Clutch ‘N’ Clean. Take your Clutch ‘N’ Clean on the go and use as the perfect travel wipe

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,776 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
